= ioc++ is a type-safe Inversion of Control (IoC) container =

(header-only library)

ioc++ type-safe Inversion of Control (IoC) container. It supports various types of objects. ioc++ is based on boost.bind, boost.function, boost.mpl, boost.static_assert, boost.type_traits, boost.smart_ptr, and boost.unordered and boost.any libraries. Boost.unordered and boost.any librariesis are used for container implementation. Boost.test is using for a testing purposes only.
